titles.title: Congratulating Taos Pueblo, its leaders and its people, on the 40th Anniversary of the return of their sacred Blue Lake lands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/16/2010--Introduced. Congratulates Taos Pueblo, its leaders, and its people on the 40th anniversary of the return of their sacred Blue Lake lands. Recognizes the struggle of the Taos Pueblo leaders and people through the years that brought about this ultimate and greatly important success. Encourages the observation of the anniversary with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
